title: Between the Two of Us
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Is something on your mind, Lanzhu?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I have to remember...... When I go over to Ayumu’s house for a sleepover, I can’t jump up and down when I get excited.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Jumping up and down......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I must not jump up and down nor run around...... Otherwise, the people living on the floor below us will be startled.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I see...... To be honest, when I went over to hang out at Ayumu’s home for the first time, that was also my first time being told that. My home is different, so I was never taught such manners.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Same. But from now on, I’ll pay close attention!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>The more people you befriend, the more opportunities you’ll have to be invited to their rooms and learn more about them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah! That’s a fresh idea for me, but it sounds exciting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. But, being able to spend time with you like this is novel too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu thinks so too! Hey, hey, what school idol videos should we watch today? Let’s watch until we get sleepy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
